data.eml:eml: Eriophyoid mite fauna (Acari: Eriophyoidea) of Gansu Province, northwestern China with descriptions of twelve new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Zi-Wei, Xue, Xiao-Feng, Hong, Xiao-Yue (2008): Eriophyoid mite fauna (Acari: Eriophyoidea) of Gansu Province, northwestern China with descriptions of twelve new species. Zootaxa 1756: 1-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181815
